main event: An unidentified flying object was observed in Worthington, Ohio on March 3, 1968.
interesting points: The observation lasted for about 10 minutes,The object was seen with the naked eye at both 2200 and 2300 hours,Physical evidence was reported in connection with the sighting,The Air Force concluded the object was likely a CAITCRAFT,The observer described the object as a large metallic disc but found it difficult to detail.
witness description: The observer described it as a large metallic disc.
